pages.text: Increases spell damage by 15%. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_lethality)Path of Lethality$(/l)$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_the_equinox)Path of the Equinox$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter glints with harmful intent. $(o)it can now deal damage like a sword.$() Imbues on the Dangerous Scepter and persists of the Path of Lethality and the Path of the Equinox.
